front.title: H.248 control of AAL2 CID Allocation

abstract.t: This contribution proposes specific procedures that media gateways shall follow for H.248 Allocation of AAL2 CIDs. This proposal covers gateways using non-AAL2 signalling (no Q.2630.x) with a backward SPVC call setup mode. This contribution attempts to build upon existing RFCs and expand upon the expected behavior of Media Gateways when receiving H.248 messaging designed to set-up and tear down AAL2 connections.
